document_data.name: Flask of Vapor
document_data.mainbody: A '''''flask of vapor''''' was a simple [[brass]] bottle that, when opened, released a continuous flow of fog until stoppered.
document_data.Powers: The flask would create a large disk of fog with a maximum size of {{SI|100|ft|long=yes}} across and {{SI|10|ft|long=yes}} high. Once that maximum volume was filled the flask would not release any new fog unless the current fog was blown away by natural or magical means.
